Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.26026377]Human immunodeficiency virus (HIV):inhibition of HIV Pseudovirus (PsV) infection in CD4+ T cells(IC50=2.5 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.26026377]CD4+ T Lymphocytes:50% cell death at 17	µM.
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: [Ref.26026377]Inhibit the infection of HIV by disrupting the HIV envelope and release viral core protein (p24).

Literature.Title: VanCompernolle S, Smith PB, Bowie JH, Tyler MJ, Unutmaz D, Rollins-Smith LA.
Literature.Author: Inhibition of HIV infection by caerin 1 antimicrobial peptides.
